basic.description:
A study of literature dealing with the fantastic or containing supernatural or uncanny elements.  This course may include samples of myth, romance, Gothic literature, and fantasy from a variety of periods.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Literature and the Fantastic

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     A grade of C in 6.0 units in ENGL100 or ENGL110.
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from ENGL273; GRMN429; LLCU329
